out of 5??by artinka nice shorts but not for curvy women i purchased these shorts in coral color. the color is beautiful but the fit just does not work for me. i should have probably predicted this given that the shorts are low rise and i am thicker around the area under the waist (so basically these shorts just split all that in half on me). j.crew -- please, make at least one shorts this season without the low rise! there are women of more than one body type! otherwise, the material gets wrinkled easily but feels quite solid. the length is ok for me (i'm 5'9''; 155 lbs) though could be a bit longer. i would recommend to go a size up. though these shorts do not fit me, i am giving them 4 stars since i genuinely believe they could work nicely on very slim women. june 11, 2014
